EmailTemplate.name: APMS SOP Application Next Steps
EmailTemplate.subject: Next step for your SecurePay Online Payments Application - {!Application__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Application__c.ContactFirstName__c},
Thank you for applying for a SecurePay Online Payments account (powered by Australia Post).
To proceed with your application we ask that you provide 100 Points of Documentation from the list below.
100 Points - Bank statement (Must display account name and number and that it is a Business bank Account) 100 Points - Signed and Stamped Letter for Bank Manager 60 Points - Transaction Listing 50 Points - Welcome Letter/Confirmation of Account 50 Points - Screenshot of Internet Banking 40 Points - Cheque
Please scan and email your documentation to onlinepayments@securepay.com.au and quote your application number - {!Application__c.Name}.
If you need help with this task, our team is on hand to help guide you. Please call us on 1300 656 372 (option 1), we’re here to help.
If you require any technical support including integrating with your eCommerce software, please contact our support team on 1300 656 372 (option 2) or email support@securepay.com.au, don’t forget to quote your application number - {!Application__c.Name}.
Regards,
The SecurePay Team SecurePay Pty Ltd – A business of Australia Post Level 8, 222 Exhibition St, Melbourne, VIC 3000 P 1300 656 372 (option 1) E onlinepayments@securepay.com.au W securepay.com.au
